name: Wedding
title: Celebrate your special day with a grand wedding ceremony.
short_description: An elegant celebration of love and union on your special day. Create lasting memories with a beautiful wedding ceremony and reception that reflects your unique love story.

name: Birthday Party
title: Host a fun-filled birthday party for your loved one and this party.
short_description: A fun-filled bash to make your birthday memorable with friends and family. Enjoy delicious food, exciting activities, and create unforgettable moments.

name: Anniversary
title: Celebrate years of love with an unforgettable anniversary event.
short_description: A romantic dinner to celebrate your years of togetherness. Share a special evening with your partner, complete with exquisite cuisine and heartfelt moments.

name: Engagement Party
title: Announce your engagement in style with a unforgettable party.
short_description: A joyous event to mark the beginning of your journey together. Gather your loved ones to celebrate your engagement with laughter, love, and a promise of forever.

name: Retirement Party
title: Bid farewell to a colleague with a memorable retirement party.
short_description: A farewell party to celebrate your retirement and new adventures. Bid farewell to your career with friends and colleagues, and look forward to the exciting times ahead.

name: Baby Shower
title: Celebrate the upcoming arrival of a new family member with a baby shower.
short_description: A joyful event to welcome and shower blessings on the arrival of your baby. Surround yourself with love and support as you prepare for this new chapter in life.
